'''Yong'an''' is a member of the [[Millelith]]. He can be found near the dockyard in [[Liyue Harbor]].

Following a certain dialogue branch for the first time gives the player five [[Milk]].

==Location==
<gallery>
NPC Location Yong'an.png|Yong'an's location
NPC Location Yong'an Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Profile==
<!-- detailed story/lore information goes here -->
Yong'an is a Millelith at Liyue's Dockyard. He has a cat allergy, sneezing loudly in presence of Butch, the wharf cat, and the nekomata [[Kirara]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Roll! A Sea of New Acquaintances}}</ref>

===Appearance===
Yong'an is a heavy-set man with short brown hair, wearing a Millelith uniform.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Yong'an:''' Hello tra&mdash;a&mdash;achoo!
:'''Yong'an:''' Sorry... Can I help?
:{{DIcon}} Are you alright?
::'''Yong'an:''' I'm fine, thanks for your concern... achoo!
::'''Yong'an:''' Terribly sorry, it's that season again and Butch is molting. This normally doesn't ha&mdash;a&mdash;achoo!
::{{DIcon}} Who's Butch?
:::'''Yong'an:''' Butch is the fiercest and strongest of all the cats here. The ginger one, and it's a she by the way.
:::'''Yong'an:''' I have names for all the cats here. Look, that's Jen-Jen, and there's Ogre Face and Cinnamon Bun...
:::'''Yong'an:''' They come over when I call them now... Achoo!
:::{{DIcon|Reward}} About the cats...
::::'''Yong'an:''' Come to think of it, I saw a girl trying to give them some milk while I was on morning patrol...ACHOO!
::::'''Yong'an:''' Thank goodness I was able to stop her. Well, not that she meant them any ill, but cats will get upset stomachs from drinking milk!
::::'''Yong'an:''' ...Maybe it's because I've been around cats for so long, but I've also stopped liking milk myself. Here, you take them...ACHOO!
:::;(Obtain {{Item|Milk|20|x=5}})
::{{DIcon}} You sure this is nothing serious?
:::'''Yong'an:''' Yes; I'm fine, I'm fine... Just a little bit allergic. It's only a... phew... little hai&mdash;hai&mdash;hairs, I can ha&mdash;a&mdash;andle it... ACHOO!
:{{DIcon}} Seen anyone around who looks a fair bit like me?
::'''Yong'an:''' Ahhchoo! ...I've been patrolling the wharf the whole time, but I can't say I've seen anyone who looks like you.
::'''Yong'an:''' *sigh* But I could always have missed something...
::'''Yong'an:''' After sticking with the cats for too long, I've gotten bad at remembering faces. I even mistook our sergeant for some old fellow asking for directions...
::'''Yong'an:''' Ah... Ah... I will keep a look out when I'm on patrol in future. While the Millelith stands guard, evil shall never {{Not a Typo|prevACHOO}}!
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye.
::'''Yong'an:''' Have a nice {{Not a Typo|trACHOO}}! Trip.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Event Dialogue==
===The Exquisite Night Chimes===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(After completing ''[[A Thousand Miles for an Enigmatic Tune]]'')
:'''Yong'an:''' Hello. I... you... cat... ATCHOO!
:'''Yong'an:''' I'm sorry... After hearing that there'll be a music festival, people sometimes come to the pier to play and sing...
:'''Yong'an:''' The cats around them got scared and ran around, shedding their fur everywhere...
:'''Yong'an:''' I... cats... aaa... ATCHOO!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Yong'an:''' Hello. I... you... cat... ATCHOO!
:'''Yong'an:''' Sorry, sorry... But you know how this year's theme is kites, right? Well, people sometimes come to the docks to test theirs out...
:'''Yong'an:''' And sometimes, they fail to fly, only to be snatched away by cats...
:'''Yong'an:''' And then I need to help them retrieve those lost kites... the cats... ATCHOO!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Springtime Charms===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Yong'an:''' Hello. I... you... cat... ATCHOO!
:'''Yong'an:''' I'm sorry... For some reason, every cat and dog in Liyue Harbor got all antsy over the last few days, running around and yelping from morning till night...
:'''Yong'an:''' It's gotten better most recently, but my allergy is still... ATCHOO! Sorry... ATCHOO!
{{Dialogue End}}

==Trivia==
* The cats at the wharf mentioned by Yong'an in his dialogue were left there by [[Yinxing]], the doctor for the [[Alcor]] who also serves as a veterinarian when she returns to Liyue Harbor.
